title: NEL service disruption due to train fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东北线列车故障导致服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan NEL kerana kerosakan kereta api
title_translations.ta: ரயில் பழுதின் காரணமாக NEL சேவை தடங்கல்

updates.text: 12/10, 7.52am: NEL service has resumed. Once again, we are sorry for the inconvenience caused
12/10, 7.44am: NEL service is delayed due to a train fault. Additional travel time of about 5 minutes may be expected. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused
